document.title: Frontier Airlines website publicly available email address validation

notes.text: All information products included in [https://github.com/cisagov/CSAF/tree/develop/csaf_files/IT/white](https://github.com/cisagov/CSAF/tree/develop/csaf_files/IT/white) are provided \"as is\" for informational purposes only. notes.title: Legal Notice

notes.text: The Frontier Airlines website has a publicly available endpoint that validates if an email addresses is associated with an account. An unauthenticated, remote attacker could determine valid email addresses, possibly aiding in further attacks.
notes.title: Risk Evaluation

notes.text: Use a sufficiently strong password unique to flyfrontier.com. Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) if available.
notes.title: Recommended Practices

notes.text: The Frontier Airlines website has a publicly available endpoint that validates if an email addresses is associated with an account. An unauthenticated, remote attacker could determine valid email addresses, possibly aiding in further attacks.
